SPtr< Cam2 > cam

Detailed Description

The CameraMan2 class allows a camera to be placed in a 2D scenegraph.

It is a leaf node that has spatial and bounding information.

See also:
Cam2
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java engine by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
